About Me

get to know me more !!

BIO

Enthusiastic , Motivated and passionate in web development! Had a 3 plus years experience as Manual and Automation tester. Interested in working and learning new concepts and topics in Web development.

Accenture

QA, Automation Tester
• Worked for 3 plus year as a manual tester, Automtion tester, handled team of 4 members as module lead.• Developed Automation regression suit , involved in responsive and web application testing.• Used Selenium, web driver, Perfeto automtion tools and also suggested better automation methods ans tools which increased productivity.

Anthem

Automation Tester
• Certified SAFe4 Practioner. • Provided automated testing as part of the Scrum team following SAFe development • Developed automation regression test suite using Selenium and Quantum framework for health-care focused mobile applications. • Used Jira, Confluence.

ODU

Web developer
•Worked on Academic and self projects in PHP, Laravel, Node.js. • Have working knowledge in Java, bootstrap, Sass, CSS , MVC concepts, Mongo-DB. • passionate in working on projects as a fullstack developer.
